General.Name: Holtek Semiconductor Inc
General.Description: Holtek Semiconductor Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells integrated circuits in Taiwan, China, and internationally. The company provides a range of general purpose and specialized types of microcontrollers (MCU) for use in the areas of voice, communication, computer peripheral, household appliance, medical equipment, automotive, security, etc.; and power management devices, LCD and LED drive/control chips, ultra-high resolution fingerprint identification sensors, various sensor modules, and other peripheral devices. It's MCU products are used for general purpose, motor MCU and peripheral, health and measurement, security and safety, touch / proximity & peripheral, music and voice, wireless, interface bridge, battery and power management, display, special purpose, amplifier and comparator, module, EEPROM memory, and video, as well as CCD/CIS analog signal processors, real time clocks, encoder/decoder, and infrared. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
